author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter LED shower niche tips…I install the Schluter profile so that it’s centered. Then I set the tile to match the pattern on the main wall. The LIPROTEC light strip connects to the waterproof cable in the top of the niche. Power is controlled by the dimmer/driver switch outside the shower. I love how this niche turned out. Many thanks to @schlutersystems1  for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#showerniche #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter LED Shower Niche Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
